lexUnit.name: recover.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: return to a normal state of health, mind, or strength

sentence.text: The port never recovered from this blow and about 10 per cent of the trade lost to Gdynia during this crisis never returned .

So in came James -- and he recovered from a jittery start to stamp his authority on an emphatic Liverpool win .

A BABY girl was recovering today after being hit by an exploding firework .
